encryption_key.intro: Please enter the encryption key for your ESPHome device if required:
encryption_key.label: Encryption Key

encryption_info.title: Adding Encryption Key After Pairing
encryption_info.step1: Open the Homey app on your mobile device
encryption_info.step3: Select your ESPHome P1 Reader device
encryption_info.step4: Tap on the gear icon to open device settings
encryption_info.step5: Enter the encryption key in the 'Advanced Settings' section
encryption_info.note: Ensure the encryption key is correct to enable secure communication with your device.
